mapper.sql: manager_id as managerId, manager_name as managerName, pwd, true_name as trueName, dept_id as deptId, salt, authority_group_id as authorityGroupId, nick_name as nickName, list_order as listOrder, create_time as createTime, create_by as createBy, update_time as updateTime, update_by as updateBy, state
mapper.insert: insert into t_manager(manager_id, manager_name, pwd, salt, true_name, nick_name, authority_group_id, list_order, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, state) values (#{managerId}, #{managerName}, #{pwd}, #{salt}, #{trueName}, #{nickName}, #{authorityGroupId}, #{listOrder}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy}, #{state})
mapper.update: update t_manager set pwd = #{pwd}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime} where manager_id = #{managerId}

update t_manager set manager_name = #{managerName} ,pwd = #{pwd} ,true_name = #{trueName} ,dept_id = #{deptId} ,nick_name = #{nickName} ,list_order = #{listOrder} ,create_time = #{createTime} ,create_by = #{createBy} ,update_time = #{updateTime} ,update_by = #{updateBy} where manager_id = #{managerId}
mapper.select: select from t_manager where state = #{vo.state} and (manager_name like #{params.keyword} or true_name like #{params.keyword})
select from t_manager where state = #{vo.state} and (manager_name like #{params.keyword} or true_name like #{params.keyword})
select from t_manager where manager_name = #{managerName} and authority_group_id = #{authorityGroupId} and manager_id <> #{managerId} and state = #{state}
mapper.update: update t_manager set state = #{state} where manager_id = #{managerId}
update t_manager set state = #{state} where manager_id in #{managerId}
